title: sans serif...like revue
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content:
Banco, designed by French graphic and poster designer Roger Excoffon and released in 1952 by the Fonderie Olive. [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/banco/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112247/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/banco/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/banco/")
